thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: rob flipse

author: rob flipse
title: rob flipse
text: Do not book your hotel via Amoma!! Perhaps they are cheaper but wenn you have to cancel your reservation (done in March for August!) in my case within one day after some hours(!) because of personal reasons they can only explain you their cancellation policy and let you pay. Normal answers on your request you do not receive: only information about their cancellation policy. They do not know the word accommodation. In anyway I will never use Amoma again!!
